title: The Soviet Union: life in Moscow
creator_credit: ABC-TV (Australia), Jules Power Productions, McGraw-Hill Films and Gene Feldman
brief_description: Portrays living conditions in Moscow in order to show the problems faced by the Soviet people as they attempt to build a modern, industrial urbanised society. The emphasis in the economy is changing from heavy industrial goods towards consumer products.
creator_credit_for_label: ABC-TV (Australia), Jules Power Productions, McGraw-Hill Films and Gene Feldman
